sentences.en: For her medical care, the family was forced to turn to Medicaid.
sentences.cn: 为了她的医疗，家人被迫求助于医疗补助署。

sentences.en: The Medicaid Buy - In program offers Medicaid coverage to people with disabilities.
sentences.cn: 医疗补助的买入项目把残疾人也纳入到医保体系中来.

sentences.en: Virginia , for example, overhauled its Medicaid program in 2005, raising rates 30 percent.
sentences.cn: 例如弗吉尼亚州在2005年检查了医疗补助程序, 增长了30%.

trans.tran_cn: （亦作 m-）<美>（由各级政府资助、以穷人和伤残者为对象的）医疗补助（制度）
trans.tran_en: a system in the US by which the government helps to pay the cost of medical treatment for poor people
